para_one: Welcome to Hackerstellar, a 24-Hour offline coding hackathon where innovation and imagination come to life. Join us on 15th and 16th April to explore the limitless potential of technology under the theme of Space Exploration. Hosted by the Computer Society of India Student’s Chapter at K. J. Somaiya College of Engineering, this problem statement based hackathon features three domains: Web App, AI/ML, and Blockchain.
para_two: At Hackerstellar, you’ll have the opportunity to network with like-minded individuals, demonstrate your abilities, develop cutting-edge technologies. With great prizes including cash prizes, vouchers, and internship opportunities, and industry experts as judges, this is an event not to be missed. Complimentary food and fun activities. Keep your eyes peeled for more updates.
